events.message: Customer reported a car accident on April 30th involving a rear-end collision at a stoplight.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident due to keywords indicating vehicle collision.
An agent specialized in auto claims was assigned to ensure thorough handling of the case.
The customer was notified that the claim has been acknowledged and is under review.
Request sent to the customer for police report, photos of vehicle damage, and repair estimates.
Customer submitted required documents including police report and garage repair quotes for assessment.
Investigation team began reviewing submitted evidence and contacted witnesses for statements.
Investigation concluded confirming fault assessment and verifying damage extent on the vehicle.
An initial settlement offer was prepared and sent to the customer for approval consideration.
Customer responded with acceptance of the settlement offer and appreciation for quick processing.
Claim approval was finalized based on customer's acceptance of the proposed settlement terms.
Settlement payment was issued promptly to the customer's bank account as per agreement.
The claim file was officially closed following successful payment and resolution notification.
All claim documentation and correspondence was archived for future reference and compliance.
